mapper.select: select ar.id, ar.code, ar.name, ar.comment, ar.creator, ar.create_time, ar.modifier, ar.modify_time, ar.status from account_role ar inner join account_group_role agr on ar.id = agr.group_id inner join account_group_user agu on agr.group_id = agu.group_id where agu.user_code = #{user}
